definitions.text: (music) a curved line spanning notes that are to be played legato

examples: in the 19th century any reference to female sexuality was considered a vile aspersion
it is difficult for a woman to understand a man's sensitivity to any slur on his virility
he had a smudge on his cheek
the pianist slurred the most beautiful passage in the sonata

definitions.text: speak disparagingly of; e.g., make a racial slur
examples: your comments are slurring your co-workers
The distinction between the two theories blurred
